mapper.delete: DELETE from stu_practice where stu_id = #{stuId} AND pra_id = #{praId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.pra_id, pra_time, pra_name, pra_site, cou_id, pra_main, tea_id FROM practice AS p LEFT JOIN stu_practice AS sp ON sp.pra_id = p.pra_id where sp.pra_id in (SELECT pra_id FROM stu_practice where stu_id = #{stuId})
